New Records: South Africa scored their highest total in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 174 off 140 balls
Pre-Game Insights: There is no specific pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa dominated the game completely, and their fast bowling straitjacketed Bangladesh
Mahmudullah showed some degree of comfort against the South Africa attack, but his fightback was simply a distraction from the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's power lower down the order was a key factor in their win
The Bangladesh lower order kept chipping away, but ultimately fell short
South Africa's bowlers shared the wickets among themselves, with Marco Jansen taking two wickets in a row
Others: The game was played at Wankhede on October 24, 2023
South Africa moved to second place on the points table, while Bangladesh sank to the bottom
